name: How To Bathe Your Cat
description:
In this game you'll have to think a lot to be able to bathe your cat.

You'll have to wet the cat



Perfume the cat



And avoid the lava!

Features

  • Bathe the cat using your logical thinking and physic intuition.
  • Create and destroy dams to channel a fluid so that it reaches the cat.
  • Experience several kind of fluids with different mechanics (Water, Lava, Gas).
  • Use bombs to make a fluid reach difficult places.
  • 40 unique handmade levels.
